messages.title: Stop Brexit
messages.content: We will stop Brexit and keep Britain united in the European Union.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The leaflet advocates stopping Brexit to keep Britain united in the European Union.
The leaflet indicates a commitment to tackling climate change but does not provide details on this policy.
The leaflet expresses a desire to build a brighter, fairer future but lacks specifics on how this would be achieved.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Jeremy Corbyn, Boris Johnson, Nigel Farage
mentions.tacticalSituation: In May 2019, it is estimated that the Liberal Democrats won the election in Ealing Central and Acton with 36% of the vote, leaving Labour behind with 30% and the Tories with 8%. It's time we were represented by a Remain MP who is not only an ardent Remainer, but also belongs to a party whose leadership and members are united.

issues.brexitEurope: We will stop Brexit and keep Britain united in the European Union.

images.caption: Vote Sonul to STOP BREXIT Build a Brighter Future

leaflet.additionalNotes:
Published and promoted by J. Ball on behalf of Sonul Badiani (Liberal Democrats) both at Ground Floor, Santon House, 53-55 Uxbridge Road, Ealing, W5 5SA
Printed by Saxoprint Ltd., GW2 Great West House, Great West Road, London, TW8 9HU
